Class EnquiryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.service.EnquiryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicantEnquiryService, BaseEnquiryService, ManagerEnquiryService, OfficerEnquiryService
public class EnquiryServiceImpl extends Object implements ApplicantEnquiryService, OfficerEnquiryService, ManagerEnquiryService
Implementation class handling applicant, officer, and manager enquiry operations. Implements ApplicantEnquiryService, OfficerEnquiryService, and ManagerEnquiryService.
